stories.text: I currently subscribe to Apple News+ (Time, Newsweek, WSJ, etc.) and The Economist. I don’t feel that NYT/WaPo provide enough quality content to warrant separate subscriptions. Even with The Economist I hesitated, but the content and analysis are really top-notch and, even if I don’t read everything, it’s at least worth supporting and helping sustain the publication.
